original_title: Dance off the Inches: Tummy Tone Party Zone!
overview: Tone, trim and tighten your waistline. The dance sequences shown are specifically designed to cinch that midsection and flatten the belly. Abs engage and get stronger the minute the workout begins.Losing inches has never been so easy! It's the fastest way to get the waistline everyone dreams of!
title: Dance off the Inches: Tummy Tone Party Zone!
